function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to monitor CO2 levels to indicate ventilation provision can lead to increased risk of COVID-19 transmission via the airborne route.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in indoor environments, especially in wintertime.","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation provision and monitoring CO2 levels to maintain adequate outdoor air supply.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, CO2 monitors.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially in wintertime.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate outdoor air supply can increase the risk of COVID-19 transmission via the airborne route.","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission in environments with inadequate outdoor air supply.","Mitigation":"Complying with existing design guidance for outdoor air supply and ventilation rates.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, CO2 monitors.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers."},{"Description":"New, more transmissible variants of the SARS-CoV-2 virus may require a review of current efforts to suppress the spread of COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 due to new, more transmissible variants of the virus.","Mitigation":"Regular review and adaptation of strategies to suppress the spread of COVID-19 in response to new virus variants.","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, vaccine development.","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies."}]}
